name: Dot Hop (itch)
description:
Dot Hop will test your reaction! Go through the color spectrum and get the best result. Colourful, but minimalistic design –  you'll be impressed! This game keeps you concentrated all the time.

How to play?

• Tap in time to jump on the next tile

Game Features:

• Simple one-touch operation
• Completely free game
• Different background colours
